TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpClientChannel extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class HttpClientChannel Inherits BaseChannelWithProperties Implements IChannel, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 HTTP 协议传输消息的客户端信道。

span.span: Implements a client channel for remote calls that uses the HTTP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道跨越远程处理边界 （例如，计算机或应用程序域） 之间传输消息。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers or application domains). 类传输使用 HTTP 协议的消息。The class transports messages using the HTTP protocol. .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用的通道用于传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端进行到的远程对象调用时，则会将调用序列化到一条消息是由客户端通道发送和接收的服务器信道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后，它是反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回的值是由服务器通道传输和接收的客户端通道。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要执行其他处理的消息在客户端，你可以指定的实现通过由其处理的所有消息传递。To perform additional processing of messages on the client-side, you can specify an implementation of the through which all messages processed by the are passed. 默认情况下，使用 SOAP 格式化程序进行序列化所有消息。By default, the uses a SOAP formatter to serialize all messages. A对象有关联的配置属性，可以在设置配置文件在运行时 (通过调用静态方法) 或以编程方式 (通过将传递集合到构造函数）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用设置远程处理服务器和其客户端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 此示例包含三个部分：The example contains three parts: - 一台服务器A server - 客户端A client - 使用服务器和客户端的远程对象A remote object used by the server and the client 下面的代码示例演示服务器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/server.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/server.cs#40)] 下面的代码示例演示了此服务器的客户端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例演示使用在服务器和客户端的远程对象。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/common.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/common.cs#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). 如果不需要接收器功能，设置`sinkProvider`参数`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. span.span: A that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的通道具有一个唯一名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 该名称用于检索特定通道时调用。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling .

.property instance int32 ChannelPriority
Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，表示分配给该信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级控制在其中竞争的客户端连接到给定的终结点; 顺序更高的优先级通道之前较低的优先级通道连接。The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels. 默认优先级为 1;允许负的优先级。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含新信道消息接收器的 URI，该信道消息接收器将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 返回将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 将消息传递给指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的通道消息接收器将消息传送到指定的 URL 或通道数据对象。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果`uri`参数是`null`，`remoteChannelData`用作接收器的目标。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 请`url`或`remoteChannelData`参数可以是`null`，但不是两者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道属性用于在运行时配置通道。Channel properties are used to configure the channel at run time. 有关可能通道属性和示例的列表，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For a list of possible channel properties and an example, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
